TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of internal radiation treatment in which the radioactive source is removed between treatments. Also called high-dose-rate remote radiation therapy and remote brachytherapy.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "high-dose-rate remote brachytherapy"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "braquiterapia remota de tasa de dosis alta"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: braquiterapia remota de tasa de dosis alta

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de tratamiento de radiación interna en la que la fuente radiactiva se extrae entre tratamientos. También se llama braquiterapia remota y radioterapia remota de tasa de dosis alta.
